General.Name: MGB Bhd
General.Description: MGB Berhad, an investment holding company, operates as a construction and development company in Malaysia. The company operates through Construction and Trading, Property Development, and Others segments. The Construction and Trading segment is involved in the design and build, civil engineering, general construction, and piling activities; trading of construction materials; and manufacture of industrialized building system precast products. The Property Development segment develops residential and commercial properties. The company also trades in building materials; and undertakes foundation construction works. In addition, it provides management consultancy and management services. The company was formerly known as ML Global Berhad and changed its name to MGB Berhad in January 2018. The company is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia. MGB Berhad is a subsidiary of LBS Bina Group Berhad.
